ai-sn34:35-40.1.4_0: immersion, and unification for immersion are not skilled in the supports for immersion.
ai-sn34:35-40.1.5_0: Transgression is skilled in gladdening the mind for immersion.
ai-sn34:35-40.1.9_0: (These six discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)

ai-sn34:46-49.0.3_0: * While sitting on his under the incomparable One, she reckoned as a ground,
ai-sn34:46-49.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...”
ai-sn34:46-49.1.3_0: His mind is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion, not skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion.
ai-sn34:46-49.1.5_0: immersion and in projecting the mind purified by immersion. ...
ai-sn34:46-49.1.6_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee. And the cream of ghee is said to be the best of these.
ai-sn34:46-49.1.7_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion but is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion.

ai-sn34:46-49.4.3_0: roaming the root of a God,
ai-sn34:50-52.0.3_0: On the Projection of a Tree of Times, etc., do they gain unworthy branches,
ai-sn34:50-52.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but not in practicing carefully for it. ...”
ai-sn34:50-52.1.3_0: immersion is not skilled in practicing carefully for immersion ...
ai-sn34:50-52.1.4_0: immersion and not in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:50-52.1.5_0: Concentration is skilled in immersion and in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:50-52.2.1_0: saying: “One meditator is skilled in projecting the mind purified by wisdom, but not in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:50-52.3.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:53-54.0.3_0: Two on scraps of Trunking, wrapped in Concert, and so on,
ai-sn34:53-54.1.2_0: “One meditator is skilled in practicing carefully for immersion but not in practicing persistently for it. ...”
ai-sn34:53-54.1.4_0: immersion but not in practicing carefully for it.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.5_0: both in practicing carefully and in practicing persistently for it.
ai-sn34:53-54.1.6_0: Anyone who has given up these things. ...
ai-sn34:53-54.2.1_0: (These two discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-sn34:55.1.3_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-sn34:55.1.4_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.5_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion but not in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.6_0: One meditator is skilled neither in practicing persistently for immersion nor in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.7_0: One meditator is skilled in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it.
ai-sn34:55.1.8_0: Of these, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, chief, highest, and finest of the four.
ai-sn34:55.1.9_0: From a cow comes milk, from milk comes curds, from curds come butter, from butter comes ghee, and from ghee comes cream of ghee. And the cream of ghee is said to be the best of these.
ai-sn34:55.1.10_0: In the same way, the meditator skilled both in practicing persistently for immersion and in doing what’s conducive to it is the foremost, best, leading, highest, and finest of the four.”
ai-sn34:55.1.11_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-sn34:55.1.12_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-sn34:55.1.14_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn34:55.1.15_0: The third sub-chapter on components is finished.
ai-sn34:55.2.3_0: led on by one’s own territory,
ai-sn34:55.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on Absorption are complete.
ai-sn34:55.3.7_0: The Book of the Aggregates is finished.
